If you were using this flag please let us know of the reasons by filing a bug. Also you can just pass in Modifier.graphicsLayer() to your BasicText calls to achieve the same behavior as before. (Id9f90)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Added default implementation for new stickyHeader DSL. Arithmetic can be performed on a SnasphotId, if necessary, by converting it to a Int or Long by using toInt() or toLong() respectively. We now log an error instead (I7ea0, b/346370327)."]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Removed experimental annotation from SemanticsPropertyReceiver.invisibleToUser(). (I4d57a)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["This library now uses JSpecify nullness annotations, which are type-use. Kotlin developers should use the following compiler arguments to enforce correct usage: -Xjspecify-annotations=strict, -Xtype-enhancement-improvements-strict-mode (Idfef8, b/326456246)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Update Compose support for wide gamut and HDR colors when running on Android Q+. (Icd8be, b/379135036)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Resource fonts that fail to load will now silently fall back to the default font, instead of the prior behavior of throwing an exception in measure. (Ib6a49)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Fix focus lost when AndroidView is detached and attached. (I53446)"]},{"tag":"li","attrs":null,"children":["Accept requestFocus() from beyond bound layout action.
